description:
hipSPARSELt is a SPARSE marshalling library, with multiple supported
backends. It sits between the application and a 'worker' SPARSE library,
marshalling inputs into the backend library and marshalling results back
to the application. hipSPARSELt exports an interface that does not
require the client to change, regardless of the chosen backend.
Currently, hipSPARSELt supports rocSPARSELt and cuSPARSELt v0.4 as
backends.
